methodology.models: Logistic, Random Forest, XGBoost, LightGBM, MLP, Ensemble
methodology.statistical_testing: Multiple corrections, White's Reality Check, Bootstrap CI
methodology.robustness: Sector, market-cap, temporal, cost, feature ablation testing

notes: Only strategies passing comprehensive significance and robustness testing are exported. All strategies meet ≥2% monthly return target after transaction costs.
